mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_IDEN, NOTICE_STATE, PERSON, QUALI_FIELD, LANGUAGE_CODE, CONTENTS, MANAGER, APPLY_DATE, MAGAN_DATE ) VALUES ( #{noticeDate}, #{noticeIden}, #{noticeState}, #{person}, #{qualiField}, #{languageCode}, #{contents}, #{manager}, #{applyDate}, #{maganDate} )
